mapper.select: SELECT e.em_code,m.m_code, e.c_code, id, phone, name, birthday, sex, email, '20'||SUBSTR(start_period,1,8)as start_period, finger_id, SUBSTR(end_period,1,8)as end_period, ca.join_date, ca.end_date FROM employee e, member m, contract c, career ca WHERE e.m_code = m.m_code AND e.c_code = c.c_code AND e.em_code = ca.em_code AND e.em_code LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
